tssurah: import { TYPE } from '../types/islam';export const surah_86: TYPE = {ayah_1: {image: '',text: 'By the sky and the night comer -',verse: 5801,},ayah_2: {image: '',text: 'And what can make you know what is the night comer?',verse: 5802,},ayah_3: {image: '',text: 'It is the piercing star -',verse: 5803,},ayah_4: {image: '',text: 'There is no soul but that it has over it a protector.',verse: 5804,},ayah_5: {image: '',text: 'So let man observe from what he was created.',verse: 5805,},ayah_6: {image: '',text: 'He was created from a fluid, ejected,',verse: 5806,},ayah_7: {image: '',text: 'Emerging from between the backbone and the ribs.',verse: 5807,},ayah_8: {image: '',text: 'Indeed, Allah, to return him [to life], is Able.',verse: 5808,},ayah_9: {image: '',text: 'The Day when secrets will be put on trial,',verse: 5809,},ayah_10: {image: '',text: 'Then man will have no power or any helper.',verse: 5810,},ayah_11: {image: '',text: 'By the sky which returns [rain]',verse: 5811,},ayah_12: {image: '',text: 'And [by] the earth which cracks open,',verse: 5812,},ayah_13: {image: '',text: 'Indeed, the Qur'an is a decisive statement,',verse: 5813,},ayah_14: {image: '',text: 'And it is not amusement.',verse: 5814,},ayah_15: {image: '',text: 'Indeed, they are planning a plan,',verse: 5815,},ayah_16: {image: '',text: 'But I am planning a plan.',verse: 5816,},ayah_17: {image: '',text: 'So allow time for the disbelievers. Leave them awhile.',verse: 5817,},name: surah_86,};
